channel.title: Method on Baki Cakici
channel.description: Recent content in Method on Baki Cakici

item.title: Navigating Complexity: Mapping, Visualisation, and Decision-Making (Autumn 2023)
item.description: The course will teach students to analyse complexity within an empirical case that explores a current topic or controversy within the field of science, technology, and innovation.

item.title: Navigating Complexity: Mapping, Visualisation, and Decision-Making (Autumn 2020)
item.description: The course will teach students to analyse complexity within an empirical case that explores a current topic or controversy within the field of science, technology, and innovation.

item.title: Doing a Transversal Method: Developing an Ethics of Care in a Collaborative Research Project
item.description: We depart from some conceptual presuppositions of methodological cosmopolitanism to define a transversal method.

item.title: Navigating Complexity: Mapping, Visualisation, and Decision-Making (Autumn 2019)
item.description: The course will teach students to analyse complexity within an empirical case that explores a current topic or controversy within the field of science, technology, and innovation.

item.title: Citizen Data and Trust in Official Statistics
item.description: In a time of alternative facts, what constitutes legitimate knowledge and expertise are major political sites of contention and struggle.

item.title: Data Scientists: A New Faction of the Transnational Field of Statistics
item.description: We discuss how data science as a field and a profession came into being in relation to but also as a critique of existing ones such as statistics and statisticians.
